title.rendered: M.K. Cheah | Head of Project Cargo

content.rendered:
MK Cheah has a BSC (1st Class Honours) in Naval Architecture. As a naval architect he offers back up naval architectural services to all the region’s offices and surveyors as well as attending to casualty and MWS projects. He is fully conversant with modern analytical naval architecture software which includes stability, strength, and sea-fastenings.

Discipline: Naval Architect / Engineer
Specialism: Shipyard & V/l owner technical and construction disputes

Contact

Singapore | +65 9661 7942
